title: Gifting
body: Is it possible to gift chroma skins? i dont seem to be able to do so.

replies.body:
Nope, Chroma Gifting is not available at this time. I suggest keeping an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any announcements regarding a change to this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
